title: Requests new location after GoogleApiClient connected
message:
Requests new location after GoogleApiClient connected

onResume is not enough, the first and only time it could happend that the google api client is not yet connected and the location won't work.
Now we update the location after the client has been connected. We also do it when navigating through menu items, which is the equivalent to the "onResume" for each fragment.

title: Adds ObtainUserAction with TDD
message:
Adds ObtainUserAction with TDD

It returns an optional of the currently logged in user, if any.
It takes the user from two possible sources: a (singleton) Session or a persisted UserDataSource.
The idea of the Session is to keep a application-wide singleton instance of the current user. Maybe we don't even need it...
Also, when the session is empty and we recover the user from the datasource, we store the user into the session.

title: Created method to replace all favoritas
message:
Created method to replace all favoritas

In loca, it runs a transaction that clears the favorita table and then saves the new favoritas.
In remote, it deletes one-by-one all favoritas and then saves the new ones. This is not used at the moment.

When requesting favoritas the local ones are replaced by the remote ones. This way deleted favoritas get removed.

title: Evita mostrar recientes sin parada
message:
Evita mostrar recientes sin parada

Si alguna parada desaparece tras actualizar los datos y estaba en reciente, la app peta al abrir la pantalla de búsqueda.
Ahora se filtran las recientes para sólo intentar mostrar las que tienen una parada asociada válida

title: Sobreescribe parada con color antiguo
message:
Sobreescribe parada con color antiguo

Cuando se abre una parada y la paleta de color leída no existe (el color no corresponde a las nuevas) interpreta que es un color antiguo y le asigna su paleta correspondiente actualizada.
Actualiza la parada en base de datos para no volver a leer el color antiguo.

title: Creado método de utilidad para convertir un color antiguo a uno nuevo
message:
Creado método de utilidad para convertir un color antiguo a uno nuevo

Mapea un valor de color de parada favorita antiguo y devuelve la nueva paleta de color equivalente
